page.title: 05SAILING CLUBS - COWES
page.content: The{Island Sailing Club}is located in the middle of the town and near the mouth of the River Medina.It provides facilities for visiting yachtsmen that no other club provides such as toilets showers,changing rooms and bars. The club was first formed by Lt.Gen.Baring with only 50 other people,now there are 3000 members,one third of whom live on the island.The club organizes the round-the-island race every year. It is one of the biggest races in the world.In 1985 the race took place on June 29th with 1200 yachts entering. Twenty three other events are organized by the I.S.C.every year. Every Tuesday they hold sailing in the Solent with about 100 boats attending. The{Royal Corinthian}& the{Royal {London}are the other two sailing clubs in the area..
